statements: DELETE FROM performance_metrics WHERE response_time > 100 AND customer_satisfaction < 3;
DELETE FROM response_times WHERE id = 1 AND response_time > 10
DELETE FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_name = 'CPU Usage';
DELETE FROM customer_satisfaction WHERE customer_id = 100 AND survey_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM performance_metrics WHERE metric_value < 10 AND metric_date > '2021-06-30';
DELETE FROM response_times WHERE id = 1 AND request_id = 100;
DELETE FROM customer_satisfaction WHERE customer_id = 500 AND satisfaction_rating < 3;
DELETE FROM satisfaction_reports WHERE report_id IN (SELECT id FROM response_time_reports WHERE response_time_ms > 1000);
DELETE FROM response_times WHERE id = 1 AND timestamp < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM customer_satisfaction WHERE customer_id = 1001 AND satisfaction_score < 4;
DELETE FROM user_activity WHERE activity_type = 'login' AND activity_timestamp < '2022-03-01';
